Arctic Leaf

The merger of the two design companies, Arctic Empire and New Leaf meant the need for a new brand identity. This was my suggestion for the branding but it wasn't chosen. I however still really like this design and think it was a great solution. Curious what the chosen identity is? Headover to the site to find out!

Date: November 2017
Category: Branding, Logo Design
Client: Arctic Leaf
Live Version: https://arcticleaf.io
